snippet: The National Academy of Sciences said the cost of any new benefits that must be provided by insurance plans under the health care overhaul should be “offset by savings” elsewhere.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)

lead_paragraph: The National Academy of Sciences said the cost of any new benefits that must be provided by insurance plans under the health care overhaul should be “offset by savings” elsewhere.

headline.main: Panel Says U.S. Should Weigh Cost in Deciding ‘Essential Health Benefits’
headline.print_headline: Panel Says U.S. Should Weigh Cost in Deciding ‘Essential Health Benefits’
headline.seo: Panel Says U.S. Should Weigh Cost in Health Coverage
